title: Section
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <section> tag defines sections in a document, such as chapters, headers, footers, or any other section of the document.

usageExamples.title: Basic Example
usageExamples.description: Create a simple section element with some text content.
usageExamples.code:
Section Title

This is a section of the document.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/section
	/h2
		Section Title
	/p
		This is a section of the document.

usageExamples.title: Section with Class
usageExamples.description: Add a class to the section element for custom styling.
usageExamples.code:
Custom Section

This section has a custom style applied.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/section .custom-section
	/h2
		Custom Section
	/p
		This section has a custom style applied.
